title: every single urf game is people picking the most broken shi and just tryharding.
body: why? why cant we have one game mode without a meta. what is up with this playerbase? maokai every single game knowing hes stupid as fuck. theres no fun in that.

replies.body:
Garen ~~LAUGHS~~ SPIN TO WIN over you {{champion:86}} 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CymeKo_4-U0

Maokai? 

You think Maolai is tryhard? Try fighting against a Wukong.
Level 9 sweeper bruh
By that time he has 20 kills and is god like.
doesn't reveal wukong just shows a shadow of him which is useless
Anyone with AoE skillshots or ground-targeted abilities can still hit him. It's not perfect, but it's also not useless.

Hec is too damn disgusting. I find shaco and maokai to be highly annoying but I'd ban Hec above all. I can kill the Eve's and Zed's but no one can kill Hec through his healing and cowardly running away if you somehow DO manage to get the upper hand. 

The trick to fighting Maokai (I've noticed) is to say fuck it and all in him level one. The cast time on his sapling toss screws him over.
Fiora and anyone who can chain cc hecrium can kill him easily.

> [{quoted}](name=MisterShameless,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TKzTKZyq,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-23T04:35:24.349+0000)
>
> Fiora and anyone who can chain cc hecrium can kill him easily.

Fiora is like the most broken shit there, maybe aside from zed, but that's it.
perma ulting perma resets perma q yi aint funny either because you can never hit him becaus ehis is untargetable 90% of the time and when he isnt he takes 70% less damage whilst healing up
still the most broken shit remains galio...

Nope, Garen is by far the most overpowered.

He can cast E, cancel it, cast it again immediately and essentially he can keep spinning the entire game. All you have to do from that point onwards is move around.

Seriously, if Zed ults Garen, Zed will die within a second. Anybody, really, can. Build a Youmuus and 5 IEs and you crit every tick of Judgment and you can do it ***forever***, so long as your keyboard or finger can hold up.
Also not to mention the fact that E does double damage because the entire scheme is a bug.
{{champion:33}} fucks yi up. Just spam taunt and rush thornmail. Yi melts himself.
taunt what? the air? hes untargetable like permanently you cant even touch him

I just fck around with AP Shaco or Wukong tbh...it's fun af

the feelz when you get downvoted cuz people dont like you playing specific champions :^)

For you, but not the enemy. 

That is my main problem with URF. When no one picks the bullcrap like Shaco, Zed, Wukong, Blitzcrank or even Maokai then the game mode is really fun. 

But when the enemy has at least one of them...then the mode is no fun for you. Sure it would be fun for the person playing the OP champ, but playing against it....I have more fun running circles around the nexus then trying to fight one of those champs.

the real problem is when your team is "playing around" and picks 5 random champs and then you play against like mao/eve/zed and lose instantly in pick phase.

#giveusdraftplease
Ummmm urf is already in a draft like bans.... not picks tho......
I personally consider the infinite poke URF champs cancer. You know.... The SPEARS

PFFFFFTTTTT, more like the shockblasts that nuke you for half health every 1.6 seconds that are aoe.

(filthy & shameless Jayce main here, he puts Azir/Nidalee to shame)
I've had the most fun as xerath bc everyone loves skillshot spam

Why get slowed down and charge a skill shot than instantly firing a high speed AoE nuke that speeds you up?(Okay not everyone can place the gate on top of them and fire it accurately and instantly, but for the second shot while gate is still up its easy. As I said, Jayce main.)
a skillshot that hits everything in its path on a 1.6 cd?
Jayce Q does mroe damage, clears waves instantly and their are no downsides! if he gets jumped he has huge damage in melee too!
i will not fall to your jayce propoganda! i will spam my xerath and i will die happily
Then you will die a fool, not knowing the greatness of Jayce.
shaco is broken on that map.
{{champion:157}} is basically just... The same as normal Yasuo.

Only champions I ever see in this game mode are {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:62}} 

Meanwhile I'm over here trying to play fun and different things...like AP {{champion:18}}, AP {{champion:102}}, AD {{champion:117}} etc
I'll see your Shyvana and raise you a Skarner.
I see your Skarner and raise you AP Rekt'Sai.

winning is fun.

so players will try to win

Because it's give cancer or get cancer, such is the state of broken game modes.

You pick a not crazy broken champ->get facerolled by a crazy broken champ->next game you're the one picking the crazy broken champ.

Don't hate the player, hate the shit gamemode.
I hate both. lol. People could play a game to have fun, I know it's a strange concept

> [{quoted}](name=Taioron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TKzTKZyq,comment-id=00150000,timestamp=2016-05-23T16:13:58.022+0000)
>
> I hate both. lol. People could play a game to have fun, I know it's a strange concept

The issue is that if you play a crazy broken champ you will have fun, if you pick a more sensible champion you won't have fun if the enemy pick a crazy broken one, people realize it's not fun to get shitstomped by broken champs, but since they still want to play the mode they pick crazy broken things in the next game.

*also some people happen to like some of the broken champs there to begin with.

You can't blame the players, they are picking their champs in order to have fun and not be facerolled, I don't understand why not wanting to get facerolled makes them a problem, the only problem is the game mode.

Idk, I see a lot of "meta" spammers, but I see a lot of creative cancer, too. For example:

{{champion:43}} AP tank (my pick for this weekend)
{{champion:75}} AP liandry's rylai's spamming E (my most success this weekend)
{{champion:56}} Can't be killed by casters except Heimer and Zyra
{{champion:9}}  100% cc uptime
{{champion:39}} Goodbye Ezreal
{{champion:126}} Nonstop empowered shockblasts, crushes you if you get close
{{champion:34}} WALL SPAM, endless ulti, 80% reduced cooldown on Eggnivia
{{champion:96}} +Rylai's = doom from the fog
{{champion:59}} Uncatchable flag spammer
{{champion:133}} Nonstop blinds, passive always up, uncatchable with Vault kite
{{champion:143}} Obvious reasons, and totally underplayed in URF
{{champion:40}} as AP, ADC, tank, she shits in your cornflakes constantly and can tank towers
{{champion:15}} Q/E spam
{{champion:110}} Q spam

Like...there are tons of fun/crazy/broken URF champs that aren't in everybody's "most broken meta" list.
{{champion:78}} never ending wall slams
keep the map, change the champ select to random like aram
Full ap naut is way more fun imo. One shoting people with his ult is hilarious XD

Every champion has a unique twist or gameplay aspect integrated into their kit, completely different to other champions. 95% of these champions (bar Yasuo, Aurelion Sol, and a few other unique cases) become overly bearing and absolutely tedious to deal with when they can abuse their main source of functionality without any sort of repercussion (mana, CD, etc.) 

I mean If I dedicated 30 minutes into a list on why every champion is bullshit in URF, I feel like I'd be able to cover every single one without much difficulty (excluding the ones I mentioned above).

Basically every champion in URF is batshit broken. Can't do anything to change that apart from banning. It's still a really fun game mode.
All Random Urf would be way better
{{champion:105}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:4}}  are broken beyond belief on urf.

You gotta just play what you want mate. I ended up trying almost every champion over the course of this weekend. The most fun I had was {{champion:33}}  because the enemy team picked {{champion:11}} {{champion:5}} and other AD champions.

The game was very okay and hella hilarious (almost perma taunting was particularly fun xD)
Welcome to season 6.

> [{quoted}](name=AzureRaven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TKzTKZyq,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-23T03:39:55.607+0000)
>
> why? whyc ant we have one game mode without a meta. what is up with this playerbase? maokai every single game knowing hes stupid as fuck. theres no fun in that.

See this is how I see every ranked and normal game.  The same stupid champs over and over again.  And the same bans.

Urf mode is worlds more fun and you just can't think outside your little same old boring repetitive ranked game box.

Be imaginative.  Don't cry your normal champ is garbage because you always thought you were good.
Yes.  Yes to all of your post

"Tryharding" 

Gotta love this generation, where /trying hard/ is used a pejorative.
People enjoy winning and feeling op. Its nothing about the playerbase, thats human nature.
